title: Secret History of America - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/6/19
itunes:title: Secret History of America - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/6/19
description:
George Noory and writer Mitch Horowitz explore his research into the occult elements of the founding of the United States, the visions of researcher Manly P. Hall, and what has caused the problem of angry political debate in modern day America.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
